name: She wants everything (NETS2000)
description:
Part of the WebMedia assignment.  (Curtin University)

This game is made by Ratima Chandrema (19003292)

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.

Reference & Materials

Gamal, A. (2012). The Evolution of the Music Industry in the Post Internet Era. CMC Senior Theses, Paper 532. Retrieved from http://scholarship.claremont.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1501&context=cmc_theses

Stafford, S. (2010). Music in the Digital Age: The Emergence of Digital Music and Its Repercussions on the Music Industry. The Elon Journal Of Undergraduate Research In Communications, 1(2). Retrieved from http://www.elon.edu/docs/e-web/academics/communications/research/vol1no2/09staff...

Used sprite-sheets  

Tile set for a city retrieved from https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-city-tile-set

Mega man retrieved from http://spritedatabase.net/file/164/Mega_Man and ripped by Bonzai

Small alien type creature retrieved from https://opengameart.org/content/small-animated-alien-creature-64x64 and made by Dadsky

Agent character retrieved from https://opengameart.org/content/agent-character

Various Icons retrieved from https://opengameart.org/content/various-inventory-24-pixel-icon-set   and made by OceansDream

Home scene retrieved from https://www.spriters-resource.com/game_boy_advance/pokemonfireredleafgreen/sheet/3729/  and made by Sam Webster

Mouse Icon retrieved from https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/mouse-left-button_32041 and made by www.freepik.com

Sound

Click sound retrieved from https://freesound.org/people/michorvath/sounds/269718/

Fonts

Two 100% free to use fonts used which are Gabato and OldSansBlack retrieved from https://www.dafont.com/
